name: Room Builder (old version)
description:
This is the old version of Room Builder. Play the new one here!

Room Builder is a game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37. Build weapons, repair walls and fight monsters: all in one room!

It's a fast paced, action, shooting game where you have to choose how to spend your build power and resources to avoid being killed by the evil cat monsters.

Check out the Ludum Dare entry here.
